text: Arrā wa fushin-sha no tame ni jitsurei o shimesa reru. Nūfu no tsuma, soshite rūto no tsumadearu. Kare-ra ryōnin wa, 2-ri no tadashī waga shimo be no moto ni ita. Ka no on'na-tachi wa, kare-ra (otto) ni taishite fuseijitsude, arrā no omoto de nanra eru tokoro wa nakatta. Soshite `anata gata 2-ri wa (soto no) hairu mono to issho ni hi goku ni ire.' To tsuge rareta
